name: BATcoin
description: BATcoin is a DeFi-focused token on Binance Smart Chain, offering decentralized savings, lending, and staking services. Our mission is to make DeFi accessible to everyone, with a strong focus on community and real-world engagement, including partnerships with religious and social groups. With a 4% buy-and-sell tax that funds liquidity and development, BATcoin is building an inclusive financial ecosystem that promotes secure and transparent wealth growth for users
